original_title: Target’s CEO is stepping down as customers turn away | CNN Business
article_summary: Target CEO Brian Cornell is stepping down after 11 years, with Michael Fiddelke, Target's current COO, taking over on February 1, 2026. The change comes as Target faces slumping sales and backlash over its retreat on DEI, and its stock is among the worst performing in the S&P 500.</s>
